terms.name: contact affiliation
terms.value: Suzuki Lab , Department of Computational Biology and Medical Sciences, Graduate School of Frontier Sciences, The University of Tokyo

description: To identify aberrant splicing isoforms and potential neoantigens, we performed full-length cDNA sequencing of lung adenocarcinoma cell lines using a long-read sequencer MinION. We constructed a comprehensive catalog of aberrant splicing isoforms and detected isoform-specific peptides using proteome analysis.

keywords.name: submitter keyword
keywords.value: MinION, lung cancer, splicing isoform, neoantigen

title: Aberrant splicing isoforms detected by full-length transcriptome sequencing as transcripts of potential neoantigens in non-small cell lung cancer
